cards.title: Audio Library
cards.description: In my Game Audio II class, we were put in groups of two and tasked with making a game audio library. In the drive link provided, it will have the audio clips that I recorded myself and edited. I used foley sound effects using a Zoom Mic to record and Reaper to edit the clips.

cards.title: Visual Novel MQP
cards.description: A current work-in-progress for a Visual Novel. I was responsible for writing, coding, design, composing, and audio engineering.

cards.title: BlitzSpeeder Mix
cards.description: In my Game Audio II class, we were giving sound clips from a piece of work that the professor had worked on and were tasked with remixing it to around two minutes long. I used Reaper to do so, using plugins to edit the clips to my likings.
